tha-ap463:0.3_0: Sālavatī, most senior, surrounded by senior monks,
tha-ap463:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap463:3.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
tha-ap463:3.2_0: rebirth into all states of existence is eradicated,
tha-ap463:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap463:5.2_0: and skeleton without flesh or blood,
tha-ap463:5.3_0: I have realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
tha-ap463:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bāhuka.
tha-ap463:7.1_0: first with senior monks, fine rice.
